concept.title: Create Break Lines
concept.shortdesc: Creates a polyline and inserts the breakline symbol. Options are provided to control the relative size and appearance of the breakline symbol and an extension of the polyline beyond the selected start and end points.

conbody.p: To use your own block for the breakline symbol, make sure that the block contains two point objects on the Defpoints layer. Those point objects determine the placement of the symbol and how the line will be broken.
NOTE Current settings of DIMSCALEare capable of controlling the terminal size of break line flexibly.
